title: (x) "Religion" Goth serif face - Mason Serif {Marcelo}
content:
I can’t seem to place this one on my own. Does anyone recognize it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202033856im_/http:/typophile.com/files/religion_3917.gif)

 [‹ Design Council Logo - does anyone know what typeface it is?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202033856/http:/typophile.com/node/39615 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a typeface similiar to Hoefler Titling Light Swash ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202033856/http:/typophile.com/node/39625 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rickruss

comments.content: . . . which was originally named Manson, by the way.

_. . . which was originally named Manson, by the way._

See [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202033856/http:/query.nytimes.com/gst/fullpage.html?res=9C06EEDB1030F93BA35752C0A96E958260), [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202033856/http:/agda.com.au/eventsnews/tas/events/1999/JohnathonBarnbrook.html) and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071202033856/http:/www.nytimes.com/2007/09/09/books/review/Heller-t.html).
